Title: FFX Origins of a Hero
Description: Thrown into a unfamilar world, a young zanarkand experiances a series of events that change him from an out spoke athelete into a selfless hero of Spira as he challenges the cycle of death possible language and voilence warning

Title: Final Fantasy Guardians
Description: Sakura is a young Al Bhed girl full of life and spirit. She has a fairly normal life with her Uncle Cid and cousin Rikku. But when Rikku finds a strange boy washed up in a cave who claims he's from Zanarkand, a city destroyed for 1000 years, her life will change forever.

Title: Final Fantasy X Novelization
Description: 1000 years ago, an evil entity ravaged a never-sleeping city, sending the star player of the Zanarkand Abes a millennium into the future to meet a radiant summoner and her guardians who he journeys with on a pilgrimage to defeat the beast that destroyed his home town. Meanwhile, he learns horrific truths about his past and grows feelings for the summoner that he guards

Title: Final Fantasy X: Her Eternal Calm
Description: You know the story. But what if Yuna had chosen a different path for her ending, and ultimately create a new beginning? Her love for Tidus will change the course of Spira and the Eternal Calm forever.

Title: Final Fantasy X: Our Story
Description: Told through the eyes of not famous-star-player-of-the-Zanarkand-Abes. But Tidus. Secrets will be uncovered, his hatred for his father renewed, and the love for another will blossom. Listen to his story. This may be our last chance.

Title: Final Fantasy X3: Our Story
Description: Sin is abolished, Vegnagun is just a memory,and Yuna has finally been reunited with Tidus. What will Spira hold for them as they continue their journey together with their friends? Is this the fairy tale ending Yuna and Tidus hoped it would be?

Title: Fumbling Towards Ecstasy
Description: Near the end of her pilgrimage, Yuna decides she needs to extract a little more from life. One guardian is more than willing to help, til the end. An inevitable end made all the more horrifying, because she dared to love him.

Title: Someday the Dream Will End
Description: When Tidus finds himself in a strange new world, how far will he have to go to get back home?

Title: Spira's Dream
Description: Tidus returns to Spira, but questions about how remain. Is he real this time? Or is something else going on with the secrets that Spira continues to hold?

Title: Spira's Dream : Spira's Revenge
Description: It seems Tidus isn't the only ghost from Zanarkand, and Spira's troubles aren't over yet.

Title: Spira's Dream : Spira's Sphere
Description: As Tidus struggles to come to terms with the truth about what he is, the search for Spira's truth begins.

Title: The Gunslinger
Description: Vincent Valentine: A hero of legend, sleeping through time. What happens when he wakes up in Spira to find a new terror destroying the land and a new group of heroes asking for his help?

Title: This Is My Story
Description: Yuna finally gets Tidus back, but with Baralai's disappearance and life like dreams channeling people's lives who lived 1000 years ago...she needs to save the day before settling down!

Title: Twist in Fate
Description: After escorting 3 summoners in a row, Lady Yue had enough. Until she meets up with Lady Yuna and her guardians that changed her world upside down. Follow Lady Yue as she gains new friends, new family and falls for a certain legendary guardian in red. But what awaits them all in Zanarkand?

Title: Unknown to Spira
Description: The past is found in the present, how many secrets have been hidden?

Title: "Herbal" Tea
Description: Hermione brews a potion to help Ron and her clear the air and overcome their nerves, but Fleur's presence complicates things a little.

Title: "Initiation" By Veela
Description: After his heroics during the second task, Harry’s caught someone’s eye and she doesn’t have to take no for an answer.

Title: 3 Nights and 2 days
Description: During their stay at the Burrow before their fourth year, Harry and Hermione are forced to share a bed for three nights. They get acquainted with each other in a more intimate way.

Title: 30 Minutes That Changed Everything
Description: Year 2148: Gobal Population: 1. He made a mistake 150 years ago or so and now the human race no longer exists. For a century or so, he has sought a way to fix it all. Can he, or is the end of the world inevitable?

Title: 40 Weeks of Waiting
Description: After adjusting to motherhood with James, Ginny finds out she pregnant again. So soon? Hermione is finally pregnant after almost a year of trying. Ginny finally has someone to share the next 40 weeks with, and glad its her best friend. Between Hermione's questions and Ginny's moods swings, its going to be a long 40 weeks.

Title: A Badgers Champion
Description: The Potters had a plan for when the Dark Lord struck on Halloween. It was risky, but it worked. Lily and James Potter both survived the encounter, and their son was now the marked boy who lived. Eleven years later he sets off to Hogwarts with training to change the world. Little does he realize the Dark Lord he thought was gone, would return sooner rather than later.

Title: A Blossom Amidst the Thorns
Description: Hermione has an encounter before she starts at Hogwarts that will influence her throughout her school life. How long does it take for a crush to become obsession?

Title: A Champion's New Hope
Description: Beginning during the Goblet of Fire, Harry looks to different friends for support after both Ron and Hermione refuse to believe that he did not put his name in the Goblet. Including one unexpected friend: Daphne Greengrass.

Title: A Change That’s Better Than A Rest
Description: Harry and Neville have a very unusual way to celebrate their birthdays: wife-swapping!

Title: A Cytherea game of hide-and-seek
Description: A story of Hermione's seducing Ginny during a game of hide and seek, hiding a spell where it was least expected.

Title: A Different Beginning
Description: What if Harry's life had been different? What if his parents didn't die? Join Harry in his adventure with his friends as he falls in love and fulfills the prophecy.

Title: A Different Beginning : A New Beginning
Description: Harry and his friends enter seventh year and find heartache, happiness, pain, and see the end of the war. Join the characters as new babies, weddings, death, and the beginning of the future comes along.

Title: A Different Halloween
Description: Could a chance meeting change history? What would a different Halloween in 1981 mean for wizarding Britain?

Title: A different life
Description: After the battle of Hogwarts, Harry hears some shocking news. Someone he thinks is dead is really alive which leads his life in a completely different directly that where his life was heading.

Title: A Different Path
Description: What if Harry had someone at the end of the Deathly Hallows to give him a different perspective on things? How might have this affected his decision to go to his death to save the magical world?

Title: A Different Sort of Bond
Description: An unusual mishap in Sixth Year Potions makes Harry and Daphne Greengrass spend a lot of time together.

Title: A Different Way of Looking At Things
Description: a surprising conversation in the summer between 6th and 7th year makes Harry think about Hermione in a whole new way

Title: A Godfather's Gift: A Second Chance
Description: In the midst of a war ravaged house Sirius Black finds Harry alive. Making a choice that will change his life, he vows to live up to his promise to his best friend and raise his Godson as his own, forsaking his own desire for revenge. In the wake of his sorrow can be the parent Harry needs when his world fell apart? AU fic. Rated for very intense emotions and child death.

Title: A Lesson in Patience
Description: Ginny decides to teach Harry a lesson in patience.

Title: A Lesson in Propriety
Description: Ginny walks in on Harry and discovers that he is keeping secrets from her.

Title: A Love Worth Fighting For
Description: A story of a love that surpasses the test of time. A love that lives in the past, present, and future. A love that should have never been, but quickly became the only thing worth fighting for.

Title: A Magical Foursome
Description: Harry's fantasies are fulfilled in the Room of Requirement thanks to three of Hogwarts' most beautiful.

Title: A Marauder's Plan
Description: Sirius decides to stay in England after escaping Hogwarts and makes protecting Harry his priority.

Title: A Mother's Love
Description: Narcissa Malfoy will do anything to protect her son from harm. And by 'anything' I mean Harry Potter.

Title: A Night To Remember
Description: Harry and Hermione meet in the Room of Requirements.

Title: A Path of His Own
Description: His parents' deaths saved his life. Sirius' death saved his freedom. Harry sets out to face Voldemort on his own terms and without the meddling of Dumbledore.

Title: A Perfect Mess
Description: Losing your virginity can be awkward

Title: A Prefect's Duty
Description: Harry get's the prefect badge of his fifth year and his Mother shows him part of a prefect's duty.

Title: A Second Chance
Description: What would you go through to get the life you never had. Would you walk willingly into Hell even if you had only just managed to crawl out.

Title: A Second Chance
Description: Harry is given 2 weeks of vacation in London before returning to his 6th year at Hogwarts when he runs into Parvati. Alone and spending more time together they soon find love

Title: A Shadowed Soul
Description: He was abandoned at a young age, the world believing him dead. They were wrong. Death Eaters believed untouchable are dying. Who is this assassin? Will he join Dumbledore or take the war into his own hands?

Title: A Sirius Matter
Description: A few days after being rescued from the dementor's kiss, Sirius Black decides to share information with Harry about his destiny. The story continues on from there.

Title: A Slave For You
Description: Fleur knew that Hermione belonged to her the moment they met. Now with the war over she comes to claim what's hers, whether Hermione wants it our not.

Title: A Time to Dance
Description: Harry one day comes across a woman he has not seen for many years.

Title: A Toy and a Friend
Description: Hermione a recieves a gift and a surprise visit from Harry on her Birthday

Title: A Very Harry Christmas
Description: The D.A is finished for Christmas. But Harry waits back to hopefully recieve a Merry Christmas from Cho. But he might get more, much much more.

Title: A Weasley Tradition
Description: The war's over and Harry wants to marry Ginny. However, a Weasley 'tradition' may make this harder than he imagined. Written prior to DH

Title: Abracadabra
Description: Hermione and Harry Granger are about to enter Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. Harry had a couple of extra passengers.

Title: Accidents Should Happen
Description: Hermione is in her 5th year and accidentally gets sent back in time when she breaks her Time Turner.

Title: Accio Evans
Description: When Lily saw James on the Hogwarts Express to start seventh year, she knew he'd changed, and although she tries to deny it, she finds herself falling for the more mature head boy James. Sirius finds himself in more emotional confusion than he ever has and falling for a girl?

Title: Affliction
Description: Hermione had always wondered if it was the idea that the French were passionate, or if it was just Fleur herself that shone so brightly, so powerfully like a burning star that Hermione could only stare in wonder before she had to look away.

Title: After the Battle
Description: What happened between the final battle of Hogwarts and the Epilogue of 19 years later. How did Harry and Ginny get back together? What was their life like?

Title: After the Dawn
Description: Harry Potter has defeated Voldemort. The wizarding world is finally at peace. But one old enemy managed to survive the curse that should have killed her... and she has a few tricks up her...sleeve.

Title: All at Once
Description: Harry didn't go to Hogwarts, he went to Stonewall Secondary. His main goal in life was to leave the Dursleys' and go to college, until Remus Lupin finds him on his seventeenth birthday and his life changes all at once

Title: All My Loving
Description: Hermione is engaged to Ron and Harry to Ginny and everyone is happy, or so they think. What happens when memories brew sexual tension between Harry and Hermione? Who really loves who? Is it love at all?

Title: Alpha : Becoming Alpha
Description: A single difference changed Harry Potter as he began his life at the majestic castle known as Hogwarts. Collecting friends from all four Houses, he starts his journey by becoming the Alpha. Will the changes hinder or help his destiny?

Title: Alpha : Clash of the Alphas
Description: With just two more years at Hogwarts left, Harry must fight for his position as Alpha when another Alpha challenges him for it – twice. As the war comes to a high point, everyone must get along and fight for their lives or they stand to lose everything.

Title: Alpha : Return of an Alpha
Description: For three years, Harry has been Becoming Alpha of Hogwarts. Now another Alpha is returning, bringing with him darkness, chaos, and battle. Watch as sides line up for war, and people and society change.

Title: Always and Forever
Description: It starts at the end of Harry's third year, and continues thru his seventh. There is action in many of the chapters, but it's not the focus of the main story. I believe the overwhelming focus should be the main characters. I'm trying to write about a realistic and honest relationship between Harry and Hermione.

Title: Amis ou presque
Description: Laissez moi vous raconter notre dernière année, à moi et à mes trois meilleurs amis. Elle fut magique et pleine de rebondissements...

Title: An Unexpected Guest
Description: Harry and Ginny are gagging for it and when an unexpected guest arrives things get kinky and hotter.

Title: Angel on Campus
Description: They had turned their backs on Harry, in the time of his greatest need, so he left the wizarding world, to become a stranger, in a strange environment.

Title: Another Night
Description: After another D.A. meeting Harry and Susan have some fun in the room of requirement.

Title: Après
Description: Ma fic' commence directement après le tome 7 mais ne tient pas compte de l'épilogue

Title: Are You Being Served?
Description: Harry and Ginny shop for a bed.

Title: At The End Of All Things
Description: When Hermione dies, Harry is willing to do anything to save her

Title: Aucune Defense Pour Toi
Description: Fleur is not an expert in the ways of love, but in Hermione's final year with time running out, the learning curve is steep. Written, with permission, as a companion piece to Dreiser's "No Defense for You" in Fleur's POV.

Title: Baby, It's Cold Outside
Description: Hermione really can't stay, the weather is getting bad. But her boyfriend has other ideas to keep the chill out and Hermione in his flat. A tale of the wolf and the mouse.

Title: Baisers Mortels
Description: Elles sont sexy, délurées et absolument originales : Ginny et Hermione, toutes deux les à Serpentard... Vous allez les détester...

Title: Banking on Her
Description: Harry reckons his future is bleak if he stays at Hogwarts. The Tri-Wizard tournament offers him a fail-safe way of escaping his perceived destiny, that is until Harry discovered the hidden costs.

Title: Be Prepared
Description: After Harry's 5th Year, Dumbledore decides that he must break his vow to the ministry and take dirct acton to help Harry fulfill his destiny.

Title: Beginning of a New Life
Description: After the events of fourth year, Harry does not return to Privet Drive. He, with the help of Gringotts, decides to travel and learn as much as he can to help him in the fight against Voldemort.

Title: Beginning to Question
Description: tarts summer after OOTP. Harry begins asking why, and gets help from an unexpected source to start facing his life head on.

Title: Behind Closed Doors
Description: Early in the morning Harry is wide awake and so he goes to spy on Ginny invisible behind closed doors.

Title: Belongings
Description: Harry doesn't wan't anyone looking at Ginny, she is his and only his Exhib

Title: Beltane Child
Description: Harry needs some time to let his guard down in the war. So he goes to a celebration just before he, Ron and Hermione plan to get Hufflepuff's Cup from Bellatrix Lestrange's vault. Who could have guessed what the consequences would be?

Title: Best Friends with Benefits
Description: Harry and Hermione are great friends, the best of friends... what happens when they decide to give their friendship some benefits? It's a good idea until it becomes a bad idea and it becomes bad really, really fast…

Title: Birthday Happiness
Description: Harry is stuck at his office on his birthday... How is Hermione going to cheer him up when he gets home? Why using a Potions Magazine of course!

Title: Black Heir
Description: This is the Hawk-style version of the heavily overused Harry-gets-a-letter-from-dead-Sirius plotline and stuff happens due to this. Hopefully a good read in spite of this boring premise...

Title: Black Magic Woman
Description: Six years after a brief moment just after the fall of the Dark Lord, Hermione and Narcissa meet again.

Title: Black, Gray and White
Description: Harry disappeared after the tri-wizard tournament. After 2 years he is back, but alot has changed...

Title: Blackmail
Description: After the world cup, Ginny blackmails Harry into a relationship

Title: Blame it on the Fire Whiskey
Description: After a night at the Hog's Head Inn Ron finds himself in bed with two very drunk and very horny girls, the rest is self explanatory

Title: Blissful Escape
Description: Hermione and Ginny escape within the walls of the Burrow

Title: Blood of the Phoenix
Description: A unique visitor during the summer rewrites Harry's world and sets him on the path to Voldemort's ultimate destruction. Takes place during Order of the Phoenix.

Title: Blood of the Phoenix : Songs of the Phoenix
Description: After years of peace, Harry and his family and friends have moved on (as much as such a thing is even possible) but just when its time for the next generation to start at Hogwarts something wakes that might destroy the life that Harry and the Order worked so hard to achieve.

Title: Blood of the Phoenix : Tears of the Phoenix
Description: With a new family and new friends, Harry takes the final steps toward defeating Voldemort once and for all.

Title: Bloodlines
Description: Harry's friends abandon him after his name comes out of the Goblet of Fire. He finds an unexpected ally and an underground secret society that shows him that not everything is what it seems.

Title: Bonds of Time : Harry Potter And The Bonds Of Time
Description: During the memorial party marking the third anniversary of the Battle of Hogwarts, Death Eaters attack the Ministry of Magic. In the skirmish, Harry and Ginny Potter wind up in the Time Chamber, a part of the Department of Mysteries and fall into a mysterious pool of water. When they wake up, Harry is eleven years old again and back on Privet Drive, and Ginny is ten and back in the Burrow, but they have their memories, thoughts and magical knowledge of their older selves. Stuck in the past with no way back, they decide to change the future for the better.

Title: Bonds of Time II: Fighting Fate
Description: Bond-Mates Harry and Ginny Potter seek to change the future for the better. Weddings, pregnancy and romance looms on the horizon, but so does Death, loss and sacrifice. How can you win when you're fighting against Fate?

Title: Bonds of Time III: Age Of Consent
Description: Book 3 in the Bonds of Time Saga. Bond-Mates Harry and Ginny Potter thought the worst was over when they emerged victorious after the Battle of Little Hangleton. How very wrong they were. Now they have to deal with the Soul-Bond's True Power. Unpredictable, surprising consequences arise due to their Bond. To make it worse, an old enemy appears and turns everything upside down for Harry, Ginny and their friends.

Title: Both More Wondrous and Terrible
Description: Harry discovers the 'power he knows not'. His power can save the world from Voldemort, but can it save Harry?

Title: Bound
Description: Another soul-bond story with an unusual twist – good people.

Title: Brutal Harry
Description: Systematically abused and degraded children do not suddenly turn into well-adjusted members of society when removed from the abusive situation. Nor do they tend to be very trusting of others, or forgiving.

Title: Brutal Harry : Hero Harry
Description: As Magical England grinds itself through civil war and Magical Europe at large collapses in upon itself, Harry hunts through it all. Dumbledore has disappeared, Lucius Malfoy has publically fallen out with Fudge, and most the population of Hogwarts has fled to America, bringing many families of Muggleborns with them.

Title: Bubble Bathos
Description: Harry listens to Hermione for once and things turn out rather well

Title: Building Bridges
Description: Harry was proclaimed dead when he was two years old and ended up in an orphanage. But that was only the beginning of his journey. While trying to find his place in the world of magic, he never forgets those whom he views as family.

Title: Butterfly
Description: What if Parvati didn't want to go dancing with that boy from Beauxbatons, and dragged Harry onto the dance floor instead? A simple action leads them both into a much darker destiny filled with romance, danger and prophetic visions.

Title: By Dawn's Early Light
Description: The Burrow is always quiet in the hours following dawn.

Title: Can't Be Tamed
Description: Parties rage in the castle when it rains. Hermione gets mixed up in a game of spin the bottle...The younger kids started it, I promise! Things get blurred when you add Firewhiskey and Cho Chang!

Title: Can't Have It Both Ways
Description: If you are forced to participate in a competition that's reserved for adults only, doesn't that mean you should be considered an adult? Harry gets some much needed help and advice before having some fun by allowing his marauder heritage out to play.

Title: Can't Thank You Enough
Description: After Harry saved Gabrielle's life and Fleur from any more grief, Fleur repays him in the only way she knows how.

Title: Captured
Description: The story of how Narcissa Malfoy captures Hermione Granger and locks her up in the big-empty Malfoy Manor until Hermione finally submits to her depraved desires.

Title: Cat & Mouse
Description: When Harry Potter's doorbell rang in the middle of the night, he had no idea that it was an invitation to a game of cat and mouse. Perhaps, if he had known, he wouldn't have opened the door and let her in.

Title: Ce qui aurait pu se passer
Description: Que ce serait il passé si James et Lily Potter n'avaient pas été tués cette nuit d'Halloween 1981 ? Récit de ce qu'aurait pu être leur vie et celles des autres protagonistes de l'histoire...

Title: Champions
Description: Harry takes a moment to help another Champion during the Second Task, and the unexpected aftermath forever changes his life.

Title: Changing the Future
Description: A story about what happens after Harry and the other have read a book about the future and seeing what they could do to change what they had read.

Title: Chauvinistic Coquette
Description: How much do you think I'm worth? Look closely...look what you've branded on me. I'm yours. Take me with you; I'll let you have me. I'm better than nothing. Let me make you shine and glow and burn with passion.. I'm worth that much.

Title: Cheating Moonstones
Description: The annual masquerade at Malfoy manor proves to unmask moonstones...and cheating.

Title: Cho Pays A Forfeit
Description: Post War, The Head of Ravenclaw House has to pay off a bet she made with the Head of Gryffindor House

Title: Christmas with the Grangers
Description: Harry spends Christmas with his girlfriend's family, and though things between the Grangers seem sour, it quickly becomes the best Christmas ever.

Title: Circumstances
Description: Harry Potter begins his sixth year at Hogwarts by rescuing a girl he's never met before.

Title: Come What May or 100 Days
Description: When you lose your innocence, what comes next?

Title: Comme Avant
Description: La vie d'Harry si Lily avait décidée de tout plaquer quelques mois après son mariage et de fuir la GrandeBretagne. Harry a dix ans lorsqu'ils reviennent en Angleterre et sa vie prend alors une nouvelle tournure...

Title: Comme cendrillon version JP X LE
Description: Cendrillon, un peu comme le film avec Hillary Duff et Chad Murray ? ... Mais version James Potter et Lili Evans... Et si Lili Evans tombait amoureuse de James potter à travers le net alors qu'elle le déteste...!

Title: Complex
Description: Harry gets captured by a certain Death Eater and is tortured mercilessly...only in the most unexpected manner possible considering the situation.

Title: Complicated Life of Harry Potter
Description: Harry learns that he has a marriage contract to Tracey Davis and takes his rightful place as the head of the Ancient and Noble House of Potter, the Ancient and Noble House of Peverell and by conquest the Ancient and Noble House of Slytherin, Gryffindor and Black.

Title: Coping Methods
Description: After the war, Harry spirals downward. In the end, it's the person who accompanies him on the journey that helps him out of it.

Title: Costumes
Description: Narcissa is bored at the Blacks' Halloween party, but Lily is there to make things much more interesting.

Title: Coven of The Rose
Description: Harry's escaped from Azkaban and wants Revenge! Now this isn't your normal everyday kind of revenge, Harry is a second generation Marauder with a bone to pick with just about everyone that thinks they can just discard him like a worn out shoe

Title: Crazy Little Thing Called Love
Description: This is a story of how Lily and James got together after the infamous event that followed the DADA O.W.L... How they went from enemies to friends to finally love...

Title: Creating Your Happy Memory
Description: Daphne searches the Wizarding World's first sex club for someone to go home with but is all as it seems?

Title: Cure for Crying
Description: Hermione is crying and Cedric comes along to cheer Hermione up with the help of Cho

Title: Cure for Crying : After the Aftermath of the Third Task
Description: Harry and Hermione help comfort Cho after the Third Task.

Title: Cure for Crying : Relaxing After the Second Task
Description: Harry enters the fray.

Title: Cyber Love
Description: Harry's been leaving Ginny alone in their flat night after night with only muggle technology to keep her company. What else is a witch to do?

Title: Dans les mots de Ginevra Molly Potter
Description: Toute l'histoire et plus encore vue des yeux de la personne qui fut la plus importante dans la vie de Harry Potter.

Title: Dark Prince : A Part of Me
Description: Harry tries to adjust to his new life without Voldemort. But sometimes your past refuses to stay in the past.

Title: Dark Prince : Deepest Reflections
Description: Harry gets a chance to see what his life would have been like if Wormtail had betrayed them fully that Halloween night. He swaps his universe for the cannon universe.

Title: Dark Prince : The Darkness Within
Description: What if Wormtail hadn't told Lord Voldemort the Potters hideout. What if he took Harry straight to him instead?

Title: Dark Prince : To Correct A Wrong
Description: Harry comes back to his parents at the age of ten, but can he really forget his past and live his life? Will his 'Father' let him?

Title: Death's Champion
Description: Harry Potter fulfilled his destiny, and it only cost everything he held dear to him. As Death's Champion he's being asked to do it all over again, but this time he'll get the chance to have the family he always wanted. Will Harry once again emerge victorious or will his friends and family pay for his failure?

Title: Deprived
Description: On that fateful day, two Potters were born. One was destined to be the Boy-Who-Lived. The other was forgotten by the Wizarding World. Now, as the Triwizard Tournament nears, a strange boy is contracted to defend a beautiful girl.

Title: Desire
Description: Harry doesn't know how to help his mother, who is still depressed even a year after James left her for a younger woman. It is to his utter surprise that Lily takes matters into her own hands and finds a way to help herself get over him, and in the middle of the night, no less

Title: Dirty Little Secret
Description: Harry and Ginny broke up publicly at the end of HBP, but what about privately? This is the tale of two teenagers, and their secret and sordid relationship!

Title: Dirty' Politics and Paparazzi
Description: A dirty trap is set for one sneaky reporter. Add in political hilarity/stupidity and smut what more can you ask for.

Title: Disbelief
Description: Are Harry Potter & Sirius Black the terrorists the world believes them to be, or are they the only hope of a dying country? A story of a boy raised on the run and his bid to change the world through any means necessary.

Title: Discussions
Description: Une discussion mèrefille peut tout changer. Ginny va s'en apercevoir. Et quand elle confesse à Harry qu'elle a peur... Son statut de simple amie change aussi...

Title: Disguised Intentions Twisted Deviation
Description: With the failures at the Ministry and the Hogwarts raid, the fate of the Malfoy family lies with Narcissa's ability to deceive the Order

Title: Dominating Daphne
Description: Daphne whimpered when Master nipped at her ear. 'Good ... but we're not done with your punishment yet, are we'

Title: Domination
Description: Harry discovers a shocking secret about the Wizarding World...

Title: Don't look back in Anger
Description: Can some angry words change everything?

Title: Don't Want to Die a Virgin
Description: Harry goes to the two people he has always found attractive, to lose more than one kind of virginity before the final battle.

Title: Done a Runner
Description: A secret romance, a bothersome Headmaster, and angry Parents. What are two teens madly in love going to do when push comes to shove and everyone in the world is trying to keep them apart?

Title: Dumbledore Gets Ripped a New One
Description: This will have Harry's girlfriend/betroth/wife venting at Dumbledore for whatever dumb decision the old wizard has made concerning Harry. Like in HBG I will only have brainy girls in this. So no Ginny at all.

Title: Dumbledore's New Plan
Description: Set after the DoM fight. Harry's magic is on the fritz after Voldemort had possessed him. Now his magic will latch on to someone and Harry's world will be turned upside down.

Title: Dusk of Summer
Description: Dusk of Summer takes place during Hermione's fourth year at Hogwarts, the same year that Fleur Delacour visits the school in hope to compete in the Triwizard Tournament, and the same year they begin their love affair.

Title: Dusk of Summer : Cadence of the Rain
Description: A continuation of Fleur and Hermione's adventure taking place during the Order of the Phoenix. Our heroine's relationship reaches new levels and faces new perils, obstacles, and a few very hard, very unfortunate decisions.

Title: Dusk of Summer : Thy Kingdom Come
Description: We enter into Hermione's sixth year at Hogwarts, in which a Death Eater infiltration will leave the safety of the school in ruins and Dumbledore dead. The trio must decide whether they will continue the work their late headmaster left them, and if a certain blonde Veela will be allowed to follow them in their quest, or if she'll be forced to stay behind.

Title: Educating Hermione
Description: There are some things you just can't learn from books

Title: Enjoy the Fireworks
Description: At the apparent 'wedding' of Bill Weasley and Fleur Delacour secrets are revealed, relationships exposed, and wars ended. What's left to do but sit back and watch the fireworks.

Title: Entre ombre et lumière
Description: 6eme année à Poudlard, Harry se remet difficilement de la mort de Sirius, Ginny entre en annee de BUSE. Hermione aura fort a faire entre ses amis, les cours et le retour des Mangemorts.

Title: Entre rêve et réalité
Description: Lorsque Pansy songe à Harry Potter, ce n'est pas toujours pour lui faire du mal

Title: Entwined
Description: After an impossible encounter, two young women find their lives destined to entwine. This is the tale of Hermione Granger and Fleur Delacour, and how they fell in love.

Title: Entwined : Entangled

Description: A small series that has chaps taken from HBG and the added to it to create its own story.

Title: He's Not Dead Yet
Description: When Harry offered himself up to Voldemort, he discovered the people in the Ministry of Death are not happy with him at all. To make up for his years of blunders, Harry is sent back in time to correct everything that went wrong and to get some revenge.

Title: Healing Touch
Description: The war is over and now it is time to deal with the aftermath. Will the wounds of war overcome Hermione or can she be healed

Title: Heart and Soul
Description: The Dementor attack on Harry during the summer after his fourth year leaves him on the verge of having his wand snapped. Unwilling to leave anything to chance, Sirius Black sets events into motion which will change Harry's life forever.

Title: Heirs of the Founders
Description: A more mature, knowledgeable and motivated Harry Potter goes to school. His fated encounter with Hermione Granger-given a different target for her authority worshiping nature-comes sooner as they share a compartment aboard the Hogwarts' Express during their first journey to school. With greater self-confidence, the muggle-born and halfblood take on the magical world, hand in hand.

Title: Helping a Friend
Description: What happens when Ginny buys Hermione a fun congrats present for becoming Head Girl

Title: Hermione & Cho: friends with benefits
Description: Set during Harry Potter and the Half-blood prince. This untold story of Hermione and Cho who become friends and secret lovers. Hermione is upset about Ron dating Lavender and Cho regrets ending things with Harry. Together they help each other though tough times.

Title: Hermione and The Veelas
Description: Hermione hated her bad luck, was wanting a normal year in school so wrong? But NO she now has to deal not with 1 but 2 veelas and to make it even better 2 Veela sisters. But they were not the only veelas making her run for her money.

Title: Hermione Bound
Description: Hermione and Harry have always been good friends, but Harry decides to try and take it a step further with some magical fun.

Title: Hermione's Advice
Description: What if Harry had asked Hermione for advice on what to do about his crush on Ginny?

Title: Hiccup Cure
Description: Hermione is having dinner and alone when Narcissa Malfoy joins her. Hermione is currently plagued by hiccups and Mrs Malfoy knows of a cure...

Title: Hidden Agenda
Description: Harry's in need of a midnight snack and finds Hermione in a compromising position.

Title: Hidden Lover
Description: Hermione has been captured. Will she even want to get away when she sees who her captor is?

Title: His Angel
Description: Starts off from the Quidditch world cup, Harry finds a more important reason to fight for and that sometimes, a fairytale or legend is a lot more than it seems.

Title: His Boy
Description: Peter Pettigrew has been captured and Sirius Black has been cleared of all charges. Now he is determined to raise his godson as his dead best friends wanted. Little Potter characters and humor ensues.

Title: His Boy : His Family
Description: Time has passed since Sirius and Harry first came back together and their family slowly began to form. Sirius continues to walk the fine like that is fatherhood, Harry faces the bold world of primary school, and as perfect as things seem, they could always change in the blink of an eye.

Title: Histoire N°11 : Une surprise dans les ténèbres
Description: Comment réagit à Ron & lavender

Title: Histoire N°12 : Apprivoisement
Description: Histoire Fleur/Bill, Fleur/Ginny

Title: Histoire N°14 : Consolation
Description: Hermione console Ginny en quatrième année.

Title: Histoire N°16 : Les anges de la nuit
Description: Tonks surprend hermione et Ginny Square Grimmauld

Title: Histoire N°24 : Solidarité féminine
Description: Hermione reçoit de l'aide pour cacher un certain livre en seconde année.

Title: Histoire N°9 : Bienvenue dans l'équipe
Description: Harry est intronisé dans l'équipe de Quidditch de Gryffondor

Title: Holly Evans and the Spiral Path
Description: Girl!Harry walks a bizarre version of Harry's life at Hogwarts, until she makes her own Mark. Darker!Everyone. Rated for unrepentent complexity, violence, sexuality and bio-squickiness.

Title: Holly Polter
Description: Pre-5th year, Harry is visited by a woman claiming to be his magical Aunt Holly, except that she can't cast spells... or keep her hands off of him... or stay out of trouble.

Title: Honeymoon
Description: Harry Ginny just married and have some fun

Title: Hot Bathtub
Description: The day of the Head Girl is exhaustive. Hermione has the habit of taking a bath in the Prefect's bathroom after a long day of work. However, today, she's got company. The company of unexpected sounds, that comes from behind another curtain.

Title: How to Make a Mother Happy
Description: Harry is cheering his mother up.

Title: I Don't Want To Be A Good Girl
Description: Hermione has a revelation

Title: I love Charms Class
Description: Harry is in his seventh year Charms class with Hermione when things begin to heat up.

Title: I Need You
Description: What if Hermione's parents had pulled her out of Hogwarts after she was nearly killed by a basilisk in her second year? How would Harry have managed without her? Years later, she returns and learns about his life in her absence.

Title: I Wandered Lonely as a Cloud
Description: Since Harry saved Draco's life during the battle of Hogwarts, Narcissa feels she owes Harry something to appease the ancient magics.

Title: I Wandered Lonely as a Cloud : Fallen Flower, Rising Star
Description: Narcissa and Alice Longbottom team up with Hermione Granger to save and rehabilitate Bellatrix Lestrange.

Title: I Want You Back
Description: What happens when you have to grow up quickly? Follow Hogwart's most unconventional couples as they deal with an untimely pregnancy, parents, marriage, graduation, and the threat of a not so dead Voldemort.

Title: I, Alone
Description: Can a child, raised to believe that he is worth little more than the dirt he sleeps upon, find the courage to rise up and face his destiny or will the weight of the entire Wizarding world that rests upon his small shoulder be the final straw that breaks him?

Title: I'll Hate You Forever, I Think
Description: Some things are universally known. Snape is unpleasant. Peter is hopeless. And James and Lily will always hate each other. But then, what does anyone really know? Join the Marauders and friends as they face tragedy, crack jokes, and, somehow, find love.

Title: I'm Not Going
Description: After beating Harry badly the Dursleys leave him at a Children's Home. When he attends school, he meets Hermione and they become friends. The Grangers adopt Harry and he lives with them. Aged 11 Harry finds he is a wizard, but is Hermione magical?

Title: If You Can Meet With Triumph And Disaster
Description: Hermione had met with dangers and challenges all her life, could she face and survive even more? Of the body, mind and heart?

Title: Il était deux fois Harry Potter
Description: Harry Potter repart sur de toutes nouvelles bases: vingt ans plus tard... avec toute la smala qu'ont engendré les personnages principaux! Sans compter leurs amis... pauvres parents, ils vont comprendre ce qu'endure un mono...

Title: Il pense donc il est
Description: Et que se serait-il passé si Harry n'avait pas eu son cerveau grillé par tant d'années chez les Dursley, et qu'il puisse exercer deux choses qui font cruellement défaut au commun des sorciers : l'esprit critique et la logique?

Title: Il s'en passe, des choses
Description:
Harry rentre en sixième année à Poudlard. Il rencontre une jeune fille qui n'a pas l'air de l'aimer et son nouveau prof de DCFM est une Auror. Ce qui est sûr, c'est qu'il va s'en passer, des choses à Poudlard, cette année!

(Personnel : Quand Sirius est une ombre !)

Title: Il y a des jours comme ça
Description: Il y a des jours comme ça où, vraiment, on ferait mieux de rester coucher... Voilà ce que se dit Lily lorsque les problèmes s'enchaînent...

Title: In the Thick of the Night
Description: Harry's body is reacting strongly to the thought of his own sister, so he goes to her room in the middle of the night to sort it out.

Title: In this World and the Next
Description: Not for Weasley fans, dark beginning and rating is for safety. A Re-do with payback on the menu.

Title: Inheritance
Description: The events of the graveyard result in interesting ramifications as Lord Voldemort is not the only one who returns to a body.

Title: Innocent
Description: Mr and Mrs Dursley of Number Four, Privet Drive, were happy to say they were perfectly normal, thank you very much. The same could not be said for their eight year old nephew, but his godfather wanted him anyway.

Title: Innocent : Identity
Description: Harry Potter was a highly unusual boy, even among wizards. The most noteworthy thing about him, however, was his talent for getting himself into trouble, which surpassed even that of his godfather.

Title: Innocent : Initiate
Description: Nearly two and a half years had passed since Kreacher had woken up to find Harry Potter asleep on his kitchen floor, and Grimmauld Place had changed dramatically since then.

Title: Inseparable
Description: A hopefully different time travel story. Adult Harry and Hermione jump back in time to the Halloween the Potters were killed and baby Harry became an orphan. These adult versions change the past in the hopes of a better future.

Title: Invisible
Description: Que vatil se passer lorsque Lily, à la suite d'un sort mal placé deviendra invisible aux yeux de tous sauf des Maraudeurs?

Title: It all started with a Hippogriff
Description: Hermione can't sleep. Harry can't either.

Title: It's a Mystery
Description:
"What're you doing here! And why are you...why are you naked!"
 "I could ask you the same question. Not that I mind though. Honestly, Evans, you should dress like that all the time."

Title: It's OK Not To Be OK (But I Promise, I'm Trying)
Description: When McGonagall finds out what Dumbledore condemned Harry to by leaving him with the Dursleys all those years ago, she is determined to do something.

Title: Jeune fille cherche tranquillité
Description: Eileen entre en sixième année à Poudlard, et espère une année calme. Mais c'est sans compter sur ses disputes avec les maraudeurs et l'un d'eux en particulier, un nouveau jeu instauré par Dumbledore, et ses amies qui se mêlent de sa vie amoureuse...

Title: Joie, peine, rire, pleure… Erreur…
Description: Les années ont passé depuis l'anéantissement de Voldemort. Joie peine rire pleure erreur… Certains ont réussit à les surmonter en construisant une famille, d'autre non et ont fuit.

Title: Join the Family
Description: Mini story

Title: Just a Glass of Firewhiskey
Description: Harry gets a little drunk and Ginny gets to enjoy the consequences. Who knew that alcohol converts Harry Potter into a tease?

Title: Keeping it Down
Description: Harry arrives at the Burrow a boy but wants to leave it a man. Ginny's brothers tell him not with her! Friends assist them in 'Keeping it Down.'

Title: Knowledge is Power
Description: When Hermione gets cursed at the Ministry, Harry and the Death Eaters discover the power he knows not. Unleashing this power has far reaching consequences.

Title: Knowledge is Power
Description: Harry is two years older than canon and raised by Remus. Neville is BWL. Story of Harry's search for knowledge to cure his mother.

Title: L'amour est une question de confiance
Description: Ginny et Harry passent une St Valentin pas comme les autres.

Title: L'Île des Deuxièmes Chances
Description: It was meant to be a short holiday from a stressful situation. Instead of simply finding escape, though, Pansy ends up finding herself and learning that second chances are precious.

Title: La douceur d'une femme
Description: Parce que pour Fleur Delacour et Hermione Granger, les nuits orageuses sont pleines de promesses ...

Title: La fille de Lily
Description: Lily Potter n'est pas morte lors de cette nuit du 31 octobre 1981, elle a été enlevé par un inconnu...un inconnu, vraiment ? Que va t-il lui arriver ?

Title: La Méthode Weasley
Description: Harry vit avec ses inchangeables amis Hermione et Ron, lorsqu'il revoit Ginny après une guerre terrible. Alors que Ron et Hermione sont toujours en train de se chercher, Harry voudra reconquérir le coeur de la jeune femme.

Title: La nuit de mes rêves
Description: Harry a commis une erreur. Il retrouve Ginny pour la réparer et passer une nuit de rêve en sa compagnie. R, sensualité et amour sont au rendezvous!

Title: La saga des Sovrano I : La pierre et les lézards
Description: Et si Harry avait eu un frére ? Et s'il avait été abandonné ? Et si James et Lily étaient toujours vivants ? Deux enfants arrivent à Poudlard. Ils ont une régle : "Ne fais jamais confiance aux adultes, Harry. C'est tous des cons, tu te souviens ?""Oui"

Title: La saga des Sovrano II : Le basilic et les lézards
Description: A Poudlard, tandis qu'Arlequin et Colombine jonglent entre leur blague, l'abrutit de Survivant, leur crétin de prof de DCFM et leurs amis survoltés, quelque chose de mauvais rôde dans les couloirs...

Title: La saga des Sovrano III : Le mec et les lézards
Description: Il est évadé, il est dangereux, il est recherché, il... va tomber sur les deux plus grandes catastrophes de tous les temps. "Harry, regarde, un chien !" "Trop cool ! On le garde ?". Ou pourquoi Sirius Black n'a pas fini de souffrir...

Title: La saga des Sovrano IV : Deux lézards et une Coupe
Description: "Chers élèves, je vous annonce qu'il n'y aura pas de Quidditch cette année !" "C'est une BLAGUE ?" "Ecoutez-moi : Il y aura un évènement unique ! Le tournoi-" "Rien à foutre ! ON VEUT LE QUIDDITCH !" En regardant Flint, Dubois, la table des Poufsouffles et les Sovrano se mettre à hurler contre lui, Dumbledore songea qu'il était grand temps qu'il prenne sa retraite...

Title: La Saga des Sovrano V : Deux Lézards et un Crapaud
Description: Vous êtes un mercenaire entrainé lâché dans un environnement pleins d'innocents. Vous êtes un professionnel, vous savez que vous pouvez être dangereux. Il va falloir plus qu'une professeure un peu désagréable et des commentaires dédaigneux sur la mort "accidentelle" de votre ami pour vous faire vous déchainer, pas vrai ? Hmm. Visiblement, vous n'êtes pas un Sovrano.

Title: Ladies' Man
Description: After the last battle, Harry finds himself sought after by many girls, but only one really has his love. Covers the time from the last battle to about a year later.

Title: Lalochezia
Description: Lalochezia - The use of abusive language to relieve stress or ease pain. Hermione is experiencing the worst pain known to womankind.

Title: Late One Night
Description: A story into the lives of Harry and Hermione as a family and as husband and wife.

Title: Le choix de Lord Voldemort
Description: Harry rencontre ses parents. Ce n'est pas dans le passé. Est ce une vision ou une réalité parallèle ? Cela l'aidera t il à mener à bien sa quête des Horcruxes ?

Title: Le coeur a ses raisons que la Raison ignore
Description: Comment Lily a-t-elle succomber au charme de James ? Que s'est-il passer lors de cette septième et dernière année à Poudlard ?

Title: Le Maraudeur Maraudé
Description: Après le meurtre de ses parents à la fin de sa sixième année, Lily est recueillie par les Potter, aurors de métier, pour assurer sa protection.

Title: Le Narcisse et la foudre
Description: Elle regrette sa vie, elle veux changer.La vie trépidante d'une femme qui reçoit les informations autour d'une tasse de thé.

Title: Le Reflet De Ses Yeux
Description: A Poudlard, un secret peut rapprocher deux personnes. Que ce soit pour la peur qu'il engendre, ou pour l'importance capitale qu'il a d'être protégé par ceux qui le détiennent.

Title: Le Trio Des Gryffondors
Description: Depuis toujours, Harry est amoureux de la belle Hermione, mais quand celui-ci ce retrouve seul au fond des bois avec elle... Il est difficile pour lui de se contrôler. Mais au lendemain d'une nuit comme celle-là, il se peut que...

Title: Le Trombinoscope
Description: Venez découvrir une séance photo vraiment pas comme les autres. Allergiques au délires ? Passez votre chemin ! Nous - oui Doenika et moi, car nous avons écrit cette bafouille à deux - n'avons peur de rien ! Surtout pas du ridicule... Un grand merci à Llalie pour sa magnifique illustration.

Title: Learning to Live Again
Description: 31st October 1981, James dies but Lily manages to escape Godrics Hollow with Harry.

Title: Leave it behind
Description: 5e année. Celle des Buses, des drames familiaux, des amours déçus, des "Sors avec moi Evans", des conflits professoraux, des pleines lunes, de la guerre. Celle où James aime bien Lily, où Lily aime bien les garçons, où tout part en vrille à Poudlard.

Title: Leaving for a Family
Description: Harry has had enough. Finally cracking when his name comes from the Goblet, he runs to the States to an old friend. Will he get the family he always wanted? Or will the Wizarding World demand their saviour back to save them?

Title: Les Reliques des Aînés
Description: Les plans établis ne fonctionnent jamais comme ils le devraient, et Harry Potter s'en rend bien compte. Alors que l'Ordre du Phénix aurait dû venir le chercher pour le transférer, c'est une toute autre personne qui se présente, de manière inattendue, au 4, Privet Drive. Piégé, livré à lui-même, Harry aurait fort à faire pour survivre à une menace mieux organisée que les Mangemort

Title: Les revoir
Description: Harry est préoccupé par la quête des horcruxes, mais depuis la mort de Dumbledore, il ne s'est jamais senti aussi seul. En cette veille de Noël, son plus grand souhait serait que ses parents fassent partie de sa vie...

Title: Les Survivants
Description: Comment se reconstruit le monde sorcier après la guerre ? Comment Harry devient un adulte ? Comment on devient Auror quand on est le Survivant ? Comment convertir Ginny Weasley au mariage ?

Title: Les Survivants : Les Bâtisseurs
Description: Maintenant Auror confirmé, Harry va aller à la rencontre de ces concitoyens au travers de ses enquêtes, tout en tissant des liens de plus en plus forts avec sa famille et ses amis.

Title: Les Survivants : Les Réformateurs
Description: Sept ans après la Bataille de Poudlard, les survivants ont des enfants et s'investissent dans le devenir de leur communauté. Suite des Survivants et des Bâtisseurs.

Title: Les temps sombres
Description: Harry a tout perdu, ses amis, sa famille, tout. Et par dessus tout, Voldemort n'est pas mort. Mais une solution, la plus folle qu'il soit... Ne vous fiez pas aux premiers chapitres. Ni au résumé, en fait.

Title: Lessons
Description: Harry believed he was alone. He wasn't. A gathering of great minds was all he needed, and whether this was Dumbledore’s wish or not, it was what had to be done in order to gain sure footing before the coming war.

Title: Let Us Cling Together
Description: A shared kiss in desperate times leads to something far greater than either of them could imagine as Harry and Hermione find themselves growing impossibly close to each other. A kiss that changes the very wheels of fate itself.

Title: Letters
Description: Students are required to write to a pen pal in the spirit of 'International Cooperation.' New friendships and a new romance arise going into the fourth year at Hogwarts.

Title: Life Lessons
Description: ...or how Pansy learned to stop worrying and hump the right blond.

Title: Life Like This
Description: Auror Tonks goes back to Hogwarts disguised as a student to protect Harry Potter and capture Sirius Black. Upon meeting a certain bookworm professor, she finds her life being turned upside down. And how will she catch Black when he's her cousin?

Title: Life Sucks, Then You Die
Description: Hermione begins to learn the truth after Harry is named a Tri-Wizard Champion. The solution is not what either extect.

Title: Lightning Speaker : Harry Potter and the Chalice of the Moon
Description: The cure for lycanthropy exists. The only problem is getting a hold of it, figuring out how to use it... okay, so there are several problems. But since when has Harry Potter let the problems win?

Title: Lightning Speaker : Harry Potter and the Sorting Hat's Gift
Description: Take a WBWL-verse, add in some Slytherin Harry with Voldemort's memories, and add just a dash of Parselmagic, and what do you get?

Title: Lightning Speaker : Harry Potter and the Tournament of Houses
Description: Scheming goblins, ancient treaties, Animagus transformations, inter-House rivalries taken to a new height, missing werewolves, insane professors... Just another year in the life of Harry Potter, twin of the false Boy-Who-Lived.

Title: Lightning Speaker : Harry Potter and the Two Heirs of Slytherin
Description: First year was bad enough. Second year is worse. Kidnappings, Horcruxes, ancient secrets, prophecies... oh, and Tom Riddle's return. Again. Yep, second year is definitely worse.

Title: Lightning Speaker : Harry Potter and the Viper's Brand
Description: Voldemort couldn't have picked a worse time to return. Between preparing for the long-awaited ambassadors, a manipulative headmaster after Sirius, and Hermione's parents threatening to withdraw her from Hogwarts, Harry had enough on his plate already. Good thing his friends are always there for him.

Title: Like Some Song You Can't Unlearn
Description: Harry has defeated Voldemort and saved all the people he cares for, so why do they all hate him? More importantly, what will he do about it?

Title: Like When We Die
Description: Hermione had never really noticed Parvati before the war, but now that it was over she looked. One-shot. Femmeslash so if you don't like don't read. Prequel to A Bit Different From Facing Voldemort

Title: Like When We Die : A Bit Different From Facing Voldemort
Description: Hermione has been cornered by a mountain troll, petrified by a basilisk, and broken into Gringotts escaping on the back of a dragon, but none of that could have prepared her for Parvati Patil.

Title: Likes to Watch
Description: Harry likes to watch.

Title: Lily's Next Great Adventure
Description: When Lily Potter dies, she meets Death in the afterlife. She has a choice: move on with James, or help Harry with his destiny. She takes the second choice. But something goes wrong. Now a girl named Holly Evans will help Harry on his path to his destiny.

Title: Lily's Plan
Description: What if Lily has survived the attack at Godric's Hallow and raised Harry on her own?

Title: Lion : Lion's Pride
Description: After Ron's death, Harry and company face their sixth year at Hogwarts. Trained by Dumbledore, will they unlock the secret in how to defeat Voldemort?

Title: Lion : The Lion Tamer
Description: Daphne likes Harry, and decides she wants to get to know him. Harry is receptive to her advances. Little do they know of how their blossoming relationship will change the course of fate.

Title: Lion : The Lion's Roar
Description: Dumbledore has died and left Harry one final task. With Daphne, Hermione and Neville at his side, Harry intends to end the war started the night his parents were killed.

Title: Loker Room
Description: During his fifth year Harry is tired of the chasers berating him. When one of them hears his rant they feel bad and decide to make it up to him.

Title: Losing Control
Description: Ginny is finishing an assignment in the library when Harry enters, acting very strangely.

Title: Love Has No Age
Description: Harry is told that he has the power of Love? With the help of a Gabrielle, Ginny and a few others he learns exactly what this means!

Title: Love in a Major Key
Description: Harry and Ginny comfort a distraught Hermione after she breaks up with Ron and she goes to their home for help. The trio of friends discover that they can make beautiful music together.

Title: Love me tonight
Description: Un prédateur rode dans la Forêt Interdite, une créature dangereuse, un être qu'il ne vaut mieux pas rencontrer. Pourtant, il y aura une personne pour croiser son chemin . . . Et débuter une toute nouvelle vie.

Title: Love me tonight : Bloody war
Description: Tout recommença lorsque je reçus une lettre de Remus Lupin. Un homme dont je n'avais pas eu de nouvelles depuis treize ans, lors de mon départ d'Angleterre.

Title: Love Will Conquer All
Description: Harry, Ron and Hermione have to find a weapon that can channel love so they can defeat Voldermort. Ginny returns to Hogwarts but refuses to give in to the death eaters, Voldermort is more interested in her then she thinks...

Title: Magnolia Crescent
Description: Instead of watching, Black talks to Harry before the Knight Bus arrives. This simple and seemingly small decision opens new doors for Harry, giving him more spells, new abilities, and a new outlook on people in general.

Title: Malfoy Manipulations
Description: Harry has plans to resume his relationship with Ginny. Unfortunately, Mrs. Malfoy calls in Harry's debt to her.

Title: Master Manipulators
Description: Post GOF Harry has to go to the Dursleys again but does he? A strange man claiming to be Harry's uncle is shaking to world Dumbledore worked hard to build.

Title: Master Manipulators : The Manipulation of War
Description: The time for subtle manipulation is over, it is time for war.

Title: Mending Bridges Broken
Description: Cho Chang is determined to mend what went awry between she and Harry Potter.

Title: Midnight Gold, The Rise Of The Forgotten Lord
Description: The chronicles of the rise of Lord Harry James Potter and his battle to rebuild the Potter family to its former glory, while working to prove himself worthy of the Potter name and its ancient legacy.

Title: More than just Teammates
Description: Set before 4th year and after Quidditch World Cup, Harry has a surprise encounter with one of his teammates. He later makes a surprise discovery at Gringotts.

Title: Muggle Things
Description: Hermione teaches Harry and Ron about Muggle things

Title: my dirty little secret
Description: la première fois d'un couple peu banal.

Title: My Green Eyed Mystery
Description: Now that Voldemort has been defeated again, the Ministry still under the rule of Fudge, has issued a Repopulation Act. So it happened that Ginny Weasley ends up engaged to the coldest snake in Slytherin named Harry Potter. However as most things these days, nothing is quite how it seems.

Title: Myrddin Emrys Returns
Description: Souls don't always live just once. They can return, typically in a time of crisis, if they are deemed worthy. This is about two such souls. Separated by houses. Will they find each other again? Will they even know? One Gryffindor, one Slytherin.

Title: Mystère sous la lune
Description: Sarah n'a pas d'amis, elle est dans la maison Serpentard, mais n'en a pas le caractère, elle s'habille toujours en noir, elle a même teint ses cheveux en noir et parle rarement. Cela va intriguer en cette septième année Lily Evans...

Title: Naraë Harry Potter, Nöé Naraë Tom Elvis Jedusor
Description: Harry Potter, sans autre espoir de vaincre le mage noir, repart 20 ans dans le passé pour tenter de sauver ceux qu'il a aimé et éradiquer à la base Voldemort.

Title: Narcotic Effects
Description: After the final battle Harry can find solace in nothing and believes himself to be a failure because of the loss of his friends. A certain manipulative, platinum haired woman decides to yank him out of the downward spiral that is his life

Title: Nephilim's Power
Description: Harry realizes that he is a Nephilim, a type of dark angel that gets its power from sex. His Nephilim powers have not matured and grown over the years because he has not had sex, so what does sixte...

Title: New Love
Description: They always say love can be dangerous, but it's always worth it right? 17 year old Harry, Goblet of Fire saga moved up to Harry's 7th year with different scenarios before that. Story set in modern times with modern technology.

Title: Night Patrol
Description: Follow Harry Potter as he goes on night patrol as a prefect.

Title: No Hurry At All
Description: Remus was so shocked at seeing Sirius fall through the veil that Harry had raced past him before the boy's intentions even registered with the werewolf. Screaming "Sirius!" Harry followed his godfather into the veil before anyone could stop him.

Title: No Name
Description: Le paraitre et les quand dira-t-on sont deux éléments essentiels à la grandeur et à la notoriété d'une famille de sang pur. Mais attention aux squelettes qui dorment dans le placard et qui sont sur le point de se montrer au grand jour…

Title: Not a Crapalogue
Description: In honor of November, a new Epilogue each day that does not suck like the one in the book.

Title: Not Fate
Description: A 30 year old Hermione decides that she needs a change. A 32 year old Fleur is led to the same conclusion. How will their new lives intersect, and what demons might be in the past?

Title: Not Go Gentle
Description: https://www.fanfiction.net/s/5399481/1/

Title: Not just a Bookworm
Description: What if Hermione answered more aggresively when Harry screamed at his two friends as he arrived. It turns to a shouting contest between two friends. Because of his anger, Harry hurts Hermione's feelings. Harry has to learn to take his anger out of people who really deserved and this leads to a really different 5th year.

Title: Not Normal
Description: His life was never normal, then it becomes truly abnormal. He must save a world he never cared for, but with others ... he can care.

Title: Not Normal : The New Normal
Description: Harry's life has changed from what it once was and he must accept his new life so that he might prepare for the war that looms in the future to avoid a far worse war he knows would be the price of failure.

Title: Not The Last Time
