Description: Daphne Greengrass always had a plan. She liked being organized. But the Dark Lord's return at the end of her fifth year derailed everything, and now she must decide who will best help her find the life she always wanted.

Title: The Real Us
Description: Everyone "knows" what happened during Harry's seven years at Hogwarts... right? Er... no. Find out the truth about Harry and Hermione.

Title: The Realm of Passing
Description: What if the Killing curse hit Harry in the Graveyard, destroying that Horcrux 3 years early. Harry returns from the limbo Realm of Passing, and he is not the same boy-who-lived.

Title: The Scottish Connection
Description: Harry may not have been as isolated as the Order thought, in the summer after 4th year. Rated for alcohol abuse, swearing, innuendo, and maybe a naughty scene or two later on.

Title: The Secret Diary of Fleur Delacour, aged 16 ¾
Description: The events of GoF as seen through the eyes of the Beauxbatons champion,

Title: The Secret Fetishes of Bellatrix Lestrange
Description: Harry gets captured by the Death Eaters, Bellatrix Lestrange has a couple of hours to herself with him in a cell in the dungeons of Malfoy Manor. Harry is chained to the wall .

Title: The Shadow of the Wizarding World
Description: At the end of 2nd year Dobby was not fast enough to stop Lucius Malfoy from unleashing the Killing Curse at Harry. The result is the soul of the Dark Lord within the boy has been destroyed releasing bits and pieces of the knowledge and power of the Dark Lord to the boy. Harry's life from 2nd year onwards and how he will cope.

Title: The Smell of Submission
Description: He was in control now, powerful, no one would take that away. He'd have her, she'd take convincing, and he'd enjoy the challenge.

Title: The Snake Within
Description: During the Christmas holidays of his fifth year Harry realizes that he should do something to keep things from spinning completely out of his control. He proceeds to make new allies and embraces his more Slytherin side to make use of his considerable resources.

Title: The Trouble With Secrets
Description: Harry and Ginny have a secret to keep. Twelve years later they learn they aren't the only ones who had kept secrets.

Title: The Unexpected Heir
Description: Harry is in his sixth year at Hogwarts and Ginny her fifth. The Second Wizarding War is nearly upon them and things are tough enough between school and saving the world, but things only get more difficult when the couple finds out that Ginny is pregnant.

Title: The Unexpected Result Of. . .
Description: After the second task, Harry wakes up to find a surprise

Title: The Vanishing Cabinet Of Time
Description: After Ron betrays them, Harry and Hermione find themselves in the Room of Requirement during the Battle of Hogwarts. In danger, Harry and Hermione hide in the Vanishing Cabinet – which abruptly throws them back in time to the end of their third year at Hogwarts, in their younger bodies. Armed with knowledge of the future, they seek to change the future for the better.

Title: The Volunteer
Description: Harry chooses to escape his grief after the war by throwing himself into work - and the arms of an unlikely witch

Title: The Warlock of Slytherin
Description: After his mother died, his father abandoned him with his relatives. Harry grew up emulating his uncle, a shrewd businessman. With his best friend and neighbor, Hermione, by his side, he has big plans to be at the top! However, his plans get derailed when it's revealed that not only is he a wizard, but his father is one too and that his twin brother is the famous Boy Who Lived!

Title: The Watchers and the Watched
Description: Daphne Potter loves having sex with her husband, Harry Potter. The only thing she likes better is having sex with Harry while watching her sister shagging Draco Malfoy.

Title: The Witches' Conspiracy
Description: Four women are disgusted with the disinterest Dumbledore shows regarding the upbringing and happiness of Harry Potter. Well if wizards won't do anything to help the boy, the witches will. And they will succeed with their conspiracy.

Title: The Wrong Twin
Description: Being sent into exile to the Muggle world by the leader of the light. the Eldest Potter's twin returns to the world that wronged him. Follow Harry though his seven years at Hogwarts and thoughtout the second War against evil.

Title: They Don't Know What They're Missing
Description: Post HBP: Ginny is pining for Harry to come home. Tonks is pining for Remus to come to his senses. They think it's time to see what the boys are missing.

Title: Thicker Than BloodRewrite
Description: Harry is taken from the Dursleys by his new neighbors after Vernon hits Harry with his car. Life at Hogwarts gets more interesting with the Boy Who Lived being disabled and even more so when unusual Death Eater activities bring in the NCIS team.

Title: Things We Do For Love
Description: Harry become enamored with Daphne Greengrass and decided that she is the one for him. What will he do to melt the Ice Queen's heart, and will she ever return his feelings?

Title: Thorns To A Rose
Description: Harry and Cho realise that somethings should be done right away

Title: Thread
Description: The red thread of fate binds two souls together forever, no matter what the obstacles, no matter what their present is.

Title: Three Sheets
Description: Sirius and Remus catch Harry prior to his fifth year at Hogwarts to give him The Talk. He might not need it as much as they think.

Title: Three's The Charm
Description: It's the end of the Battle of Hogwarts but the price has been high. The Golden Trio dearly wished that they could have done more to save lives and fate decides to grant their llow the Golden Trio as they redo their years at Hogwarts, starting from First year and work to make a difference in the wizarding world. All while trying to keep their true selves a secret.

Title: THREESOME
Description: This is my long awaited try at a threesome, starring Harry, Hermione and Ginny.

Title: Tit for Tat
Description: Hermione has a new cause, and Ron can"t help but think that this is going to be Big Trouble.

Title: To Be Loved
Description: Harry Potter grows up on Privet Drive, where he is neither loved nor hated; rather, he is treated with indifference. Will his relentless pursuit of knowledge allow him to defeat the Dark Lord? Will he ever be able to live the life he desires?

Title: To Know, To Feel, To Love
Description: Hermione looks forward to living her life but will it be the life she once thought she'd be living? When things turn out differently than she thought, Hermione finds solace and something more in her friendship with Ginny.

Title: To Master The Dark
Description: Trained by Bane himself, Harry rises from a boy hiding in a cupboard to an immortal legend. A tale of justice and revenge, idealism and murder, life and death.

Title: Ton Ame à Nu
Description: En bref, Dumbledore organise un bal de Noël plus que particulier cette année et il semblerait que James Potter en profite pour oublier peu à peu la préfète qui détient son coeur depuis si longtemps.

Title: Travel Secrets: First
Description: Harry Potter is living an unhappy life at age 27. He is forced to go on an Auror raid, when the people he saves are not who he thinks. With one last thing in his life broken, he follows through on a plan for Time-travel, back to his past self. Things were not as they once seemed.

Title: Travel Secrets: Second
Description: Harry has returned in time after one too many things went wrong, his careful plans have been messed up, so he's trying a few new things. He's searching for the diary, but while things are similar, his presence has altered enough to keep him on his toes!

Title: Travel Secrets: Third
Description: Harry's now going into his 3rd year again & it's getting complicated. Sirius still escaped & Harry has to deal with Slytherin politics & some extra timetravel on top of old drama. Rescuing Sirius is the number one mission, but things keep reverting & Harry is worried he can't change a Thing.

Title: Triwizard Champions
Description: Fleur Delacour has only known love from her family. But that's all about to change when she arrives at Hogwarts for the Triwizard Tournament.

Title: Triwizard Tales
Description: At 14, Harry Potter really wasn't prepared for the Triwizard Tournament, but if he was forced to compete he was going to do his very best

Title: Twenty One Nights of Paradise
Description: After the Second Task, Fleur rewards Harry and gets far more than she ever expected.

Title: Twisted Lines
Description: The war has been over for years but Harry is haunted by every person he lost, could he do anything to change his fate and if he can what will be the price. He aches for Ginny but can he give up what he's worked for for a chance at life he didn't want.

Title: Two for One
Description: At the Yule Ball Harry notices Padma being ignored by Ron and decides to offer to dance with her. She's grateful, one things leads to another and the twins decide to thank Harry personally.

Title: Un livre entre nous
Description: Une Lily effacée reçoit un livre rare comme récompense, un livre qui bouleversera sa vie.

Title: un petit coup de main
Description: OS Pansy/Hermione

Title: Unexpected Events
Description: What happens when the Weasley boys try to interfere in Ginny and Harry's relationship? Will Harry succumb to their threats or will fate intervene? Will Ginny have any say or will she never even know?

Title: Unexpected Pleasure
Description: Harry and Ron had something planned for Hermione she didn't expect. In Divination class, what could happen under the table?

Title: Unfaithful
Description: Bill and Fleur both love Harry and don’t know the other does. All Harry wants is a family.

Title: Unknown Relations: The Chamber of Secrets
Description: Orion Black is back for another year at Hogwarts but his hope for a peaceful year is quickly pushed aside by a pompous Defense teacher, mysterious voices in the walls and the heir of Slytherin.

Title: Unknown Relations: The Dementors of Azkaban
Description: Third year is here with another challenge:a breakout at Azkaban Prison.Orion Black must now help defend his friends, Hayden and Rose, from those who seek revenge.If only he could sort out the strange voices that come whenever Dementors are near.

Title: Unknown Relations: The Goblet of Fire
Description: With the knowledge of the family secret, Orion Black is hoping for a peaceful 4th year with no more complications. Unfortunately, it wasn't meant to be. The Triwizard Tournament has been resurrected with an invisible force set on destroying everything.

Title: Unknown Relations: The Philosopher's Stone
Description: Follow Orion Black as he enters his first year at Hogwarts and learns more than he ever imagined about his mysterious past, the scar on his forehead shaped like a lighting bolt and the boy who lived, Hayden Potter.

Title: Unknown Then Found
Description: Harry finds out he's bonded and as always, Hermione helps him uncover the details

Title: Unspeakable Things
Description: They thought Lockhart was a fraud. They were wrong; he was their guide into a world of danger, adventure, intrigue and other Unspeakable Things.

Title: Unspoken Words
Description: Have you ever woken up and realised the life you have is not the life you wish you had? Hermione finds herself in a difficult predicament and realises that in order to be truly happy she has to make some difficult sacrifices...

Title: Unstable
Description: Harry's encounter with Voldemort in the end of the first book didn't end like we thought. Riddle didn't pass an opportunity to screw with the boy's brain. In the end, that small difference ended up changing Harry into someone who would become so much more than merely "Dark Lord's equal"...

Title: Up in the Air
Description: Harry Potter's destiny was to save the world, become an Auror, and be with Ginny Weasley forever. He did the first. The second wasn't all he thought it would be, and the third is a story for a different day. Where does that leave the Chosen One so soon after his twenty-fourth birthday? And will a past acquaintance show him what or even who he wanted for his future?

Title: Up The Staircase
Description: Slytherin Harry AU. 6th Year. Harry finally finds a way up the girls dormitory staircase.

Title: Veela Love: A Headache
Description: What book shares company with Hogwarts: A History on Hermione's bedside table? Why Veela Love: A Headache does.

Title: Veela Nature
Description: Fleur will deny her Veela nature no longer.

Title: Veela Various
Description: A few months after the final battle Fleur's Veela magic choose Harry as her mate. It doesn't quite stop there though, as Hermione Granger is about to find out.

Title: Vox Corporis
Description: Following the events of the Goblet of Fire, Harry spends the summer with the Grangers, his relationship with Hermione deepens, and he and Hermione become animagi.

Title: Wand and Shield
Description: The world is breaking; war and technology are pushing on the edge of the unbelievable, and S.H.I.E.L.D. desperately attempts to keep the peace. The soldier and the scientist are not the only lights that push back against the darkness, however; magic will encompass the world again as the last wizard makes himself known.

Title: Wanking Material
Description: Hermione comes home early from a meeting and finds the boys working hard

Title: War & Passion
Description: Harry tries to stay away from Ginny for her own safety, but the passion between them could prove too much to deny. Harry, Ron and Hermione in battle training.

Title: Warning Signs
Description: Tonks has been sent to watch over Hermione Granger since her very first year at Hogwarts to protect her from Voldemort himself. During Hermione's sixth year, everything will change.

Title: Warning Signs : Subtle Signs
Description: The sequel to 'Warning Signs'. Nymphadora Tonks has been recovered from Lord Voldemort's lair broken and torn. After awakening from a coma, her life will be forever changed. In Hermione's POV.

Title: We are the Golden Trio!
Description: Rose is just born and Al is due. But after finding an ancient mirror, Harry, Ron, Hermione and baby Rose are sent back into their 11-year-old bodies the night before they first met. Trapped in the past and wary of the Wizarding World, they seek to kill Voldemort as soon as possible. Together Harry, Ron and Hermione shall show the past who the Golden Trio really are.

Title: We Stand United
Description: Harry brought back Pettigrew at the end of the Third Task, changing the course of the war. With his godfather by his side, he learns the importance of having allies during turbulent times, even if they are unexpected. How will the Wizarding world react to this new, proactive Harry?

Title: Weary Wizard
Description: When a few inappropriate questions derail the meeting at the Hog's Head, Harry lets the situation play out. Eventually, he refuses to commit his free time to teach a bunch of easily distracted fools.

Title: What Friends Are For
Description: What if Ron hadn't interrupted Harry and Hermione's talk after kissing Lavender?

Title: What If?
Description: What would have happened if Harry had asked Hermione to the Yule Ball first? How different would things have been between them and how would the wizarding world be affected by a simple question?

Title: What it Takes to Survive
Description: The visions get to Harry and he frays. Fleeing the Order during the winter holidays, will Harry show he has what it takes to survive?

Title: White, Granger?
Description: Pansy and Hermione take their relationship to a whole new level.

Title: Who knows?
Description: Il aura suffit d'une lettre... une seule. Et même pas une vraie en plus! Et les voilà pourchassant chacun un admirateur enfiévré qu'ils croient inconnu... Avec un peu de chance... qui sait s'ils ne finiront pas par se trouver?

Title: Winter Wonderland
Description: Fleur Delacour and the case of an unforgiving English winter - and oblivious, potential in-laws.

Title: Witches of Westfield
Description: The war is over, Voldemort was defeated and the summer draws to a close as the new school term begins. Harry must decide what to do with his life.

Title: With You by My Side
Description: Harry and Hermione are 'child prodigies'. Destiny managed to throw them together and they form a bond far stronger than any seen in the wizarding world. They use their intelligence to bring innovations into the world that have not been thought before.

Title: Wolf
Description: Having vanished from his home life at a young age Harry Potter has been declared dead. On a field assignment for her training Tonks finds a unusual partner and friend while in the field and maybe a even someone more.

Title: Year 8: Whispers of the Yet to Come
Description: Starts out immediately after the end of Book 7 and tells the story of life after Voldemort, leaving everyone to deal with the remaining threats in their attempt to move on in life.

Title: Yet Another SiblingWhoLived Fic
Description: Harry, the brother of the Boy Who Lived, and Hermione take their SlytherinGryffindor relationship public in their fourth year, resulting in much opposition, friendship, laughter, deaths, and resurrections.

Title: You are My Greatest Passion
Description: Voldemorts Dead,Can Harry finally live a peaceful life? Cover's the nineteen years JKR left out.

Title: You Coming to Get Me
Description: When Harry comes face to face with an old enemy... he doesn't expect to feel anything but loathing for her. But hate and lust... are not always mutually exclusive.

Title: You Don't Love Me
Description: Hermione's long time lover speaks the words 'I love you.' Hermione's reaction is not expected and Narcissa sets out to prove her love.

Title: You're Not Alone
Description: Angelina Johnson reveals her true feelings for Harry in her Seventh year.

Title: You're The One That I Want
Description: She set out to teach him a lesson, but she ended up being taught a lesson in love.

Title: "Long Overdue"
Description: Shepard has some payback.

Title: A Champion's Reward
Description: Down in the city streets, in the shadow of Aramali's sacred temple, a champion emerges from a mountain of corpses, battle-worn and exhausted. All that is left is for him to climb the temple steps to the royal bedchambers and claim his prize. What awaits him at the top of the temple is a champion's reward.

Title: A Dangerous Game
Description: Jane Shepard – a famous hero, loyal Alliance soldier, the only hope of defeating the Reapers. But behind the curtain, in the shadowy world of intrigue and dominance, violence and sex, she is the new Shadow Broker. Intent on winning the war and reshaping the galaxy to her liking. In the long and treacherous game the balance of power shifts and hunters often become pray.

Title: A Degeneration in Mass
Description: After ME2, Samara finds evidence of another rogue Ardat Yakshi on the loose. The only lead that they have is a damaged woman who had been pulled to the ME universe against her will.

Title: A Degeneration in Mass : All Creatures Great and Small
Description: After ME2, Samara finds evidence of another rogue Ardat Yakshi on the loose. The only lead that they have is a damaged woman who had been pulled to the ME universe against her will.

Title: A Degeneration in Mass : Shadow Play
Description: Having turned her back on Cerberus, Shepard finds the information on the Shadow Broker from a different source and needs to try and work on her fragile, nearly destroyed friendship with Liara if they are to triumph.

Title: A Different Path
Description: Asana Shepard was taken as a child by Asari before humans have even reached mars. She is then augmented and raised by Asari on Thessia.

Title: A Grissom Academy Christmas
Description: Jack's not really a fan of Christmas, but when Miranda decides she wants to celebrate, Subject Zero does her best to oblige her girlfriend.

Title: A Holo for Hannah
Description: Shepard record a message for her daughter before to go into her death.

Title: A Lesson in Shipboard Discipline
Description: Shepard goes to drastic measures to ensure Miranda and Jack follow her orders

Title: A Lottery That Everyone Wins
Description: A ladies-only game of Truth or Dare at Ashley's Spectre induction party takes an unusual

Title: A Lucky Woman
Description: While on Illium, Liara finds someone that can help heal the heartache that Shepard's death has caused.

Title: A Lucky Woman : Gravitation
Description: Gravitation can not be held responsible for people falling in love. Albert Einstein.

Title: A Lucky Woman : What I will be, I was
Description: Once confined to fantasy and science fiction, time travel is now simply an engineering problem.

Title: A Matriarch's Gratitude
Description: After the defeat of Sovereign and the ascension of humanity to a Council membership, Commander Shepard is contacted by Dr. Liara T'Soni. Matriarch Lidanya, captain of the asari dreadnought, the Destiny Ascension, has requested that she thank the human who saved her ship and crew, personally... In the Consort's Chambers...

Title: A New Kind of War
Description: The Crucible has been fired and the galaxy saved. With the threat of war finally over Shepard can finally have a normal peaceful life with his bond mate, but if we know Shepard we know that his life will be anything but normal and peaceful.

Title: A Night In, followed by Life After
Description: A night in with everyone's favorite ME pairing. *edit* followed by their life after the end of the war.

Title: A Taste
Description: The rebuilding from the Reaper War may still be ongoing, but Melanie Shepard and Liara T'Soni have made time for a little shore leave.

Title: A Thessian Christmas
Description: Ever since Mindoir, Ashara Shepard has never celebrated Christmas. This year though, that's going to change.

Title: A Thessian Love Story
Description: The love story between Shepard and Liara after the Reaper War.

Title: A Time of Reckoning
Description: When the war against the Reapers seemed lost, a wave of energy released from the Crucible ended all activity from the machines across the entire galaxy in a single motion. In the aftermath, the crew of the Normandy and the survivors on Earth attempt to unravel the mystery of what exactly had happened. Post-ME3. A re-imaged ending...

Title: Abducting Ashley-Extended edition
Description: Alternative Horizon. Shepard decides that Ash is coming with him, wheather she likes it or not.

Title: Adequate Repayment
Description: At the end of the night, Liara decides to give Shepard a reward (or several) for attending her book release party.

Title: Aftermath
Description: Post-Mass Effect 3 – Destroy Ending, Paragon, Spacer, Soldier, Liara romance. Based on experiences of Commander Jess Shepard, Alliance Soldier and Human Spectre. Jess Shepard was certain the end to the Reapers would be the end to her as well. When she finds herself alive instead she struggles to pick up the pieces and find her way again.

Title: All the King's Men
Description: As one of the most promising tech specialists in the Alliance Navy, but most definitely not one of its' most promising soldiers, Specialist Samantha Traynor struggles to find her place amongst a crew of the best soldiers the galaxy has to offer... and to figure out where she stands with one living legend, Commander Shepard.

Title: All the Western Stars
Description: Centuries after the end of the Reaper War, Liara T'Soni has long since retired into the quiet of private life. Yet when new threats rise to threaten the galaxy's long peace, she is forced to fight once more. Can she and a new generation of allies win yet another desperate war? What role will the Reapers - and the long-departed Shepard - have to play?

Title: All Things Pass
Description: "All things pass, love and mankind are grass." At least, that's what Shepard told herself. But some things you don't want to pass you by. - - A look at the Shepard/Liara romance.

Title: All Things Pass : After
Description: A story of the possible future for Commander Shepard and Liara T'soni.

Title: All Things Pass : Never Again
Description: A story of loss, promises, and love.

Title: All Things Pass : Sub Specie Aeternitatis
Description: A story about loss, promises, and love.

Title: Another Realm: Arrival
Description: So, I've woken up with a pounding migraine and a million questions, and no answers are in sight. The best I can do is learn to survive as I try to get ready for the invasion that I know is coming. But like everybody knows, Illium is not a safe planet. When all I've got for friends are a jaded mechanic, a bitter matriarch, and a Batarian exile, even survival can prove to be hard.

Title: Answering Machine
Description: Finally married and/or moved in together, Liara decides that it's time to record a couple-y "we live together now" message on the answering machine. Just to have fun with it, Shepard decides to start random shenanigans to distract Liara during the recording (like seducing Liara or something like that) or choses to record "bad" messages.

Title: Asari Nights : Bk 1
Description: Sultana Shepard rules the Kingdom of Normandy fairly, and in her spare time, she enjoys her harem of nubile young slavegirls, who service her every whim... until she purchases the innocent Liara, who starts out as a member of her harem, and eventually becomes her consort. However, various enemies also have designs on Shepard and her kingdom, and are willing to do just about anything to get them.

Title: Asari Nights : Bk 2
Description: Continuation of the book 1

Title: Asari Nights : Bk 3
Description: Continuation of book 2

Title: Ashara Shepard: The Fourth Life
Description: A set of stories featuring the post-war experiences of Ashara Shepard, Liara, and the rest of the Normandy crew as they struggle to rebuild what was lost and hold on to what was worth saving.

Title: Bargaining With the Devil
Description: Councilor Tevos goes to Omega to strike a secret bargain with Aria to help Commander Shepard.

Title: BBC Adventures
Description: Liara has one secret and others use it.

Title: Be All Our Sins Remembered
Description: Akuze, Chasca, Teltin. Tragedies all, but Cerberus had nothing to do with them. Miranda had nothing to do with them. Right?

Title: Beauty abd the Beast : Before the Storm
Description: The reapers are coming and Shepherd is on trial on Earth for a desperate crime. While the hero is stuck, others stand to prepare for the coming storm in his place.

Title: Beauty and the Beast : Mass Effect 1
Description: This is the Story of Commander Wayne Allen Shepherd and Tali'Zorah's less than smooth start to a relationship.

Title: Beauty and the Beast : Mass Effect 2
Description: A hero is dead, but when the human colonies start disappearing, he is resurrected to fight an old enemy. Can he succeed, in a galaxy that has changed much in just two short years?

Title: Beauty and the Beast : Mass Effect 3
Description: This is it, the time the hero has been waiting for, the reapers are here. And he will do every thing in his power to defeat them, but what will be the cost of such a victory?

Title: Berries
Description: Shepard punish Liara.

Title: Better Angels
Description: As Liara recovers from injuries received in the battle for Earth, she discovers that her final joining with Shepard has bestowed some unintended consequences. Working with the crew to get the Normandy back into space, she struggles to come to terms with the idea that she has lost the Commander for a second and final time.

Title: Beyond the Fire
Description: To breach the light, one must walk through darkness. Nicole Shepard is a Sole Survivor/Colonist with a unique history and traumas that have shaped her and will continue to define her journey. She is not a renegade, and she's not a paragon. She is a human being. And she is very, very dangerous.

Title: Beyond the Fire: DragonRise
Description: At the age of ten Nicole Shepard was raised to be a killer by Cerberus. Years later she'd managed to move on; but when she dies, they're the ones who bring her back. Can Nicole Shepard be the hero the galaxy needs? Or is she the monster she's afraid she's become?

Title: Biotic Beginnings
Description: Post ME2. Charles Magnus (OC) is a young man from earth who is invited to join the Ascension Project. However, Charles' biotic abilities are not developing as he would like. How will this shy teen fit in at the academy? How will his biotics develop? Charles is not the only new face at the academy. Jack is the new instructor, and she will have to get used to her new role.

Title: Biotics Uncontrolled
Description: While Liara can’t seem to control her biotics while having sex with her bondmate. Shepard doesn’t enjoy her quality time with Liara being interrupted.

Title: Blue
Description: As Verity Shepard grows up on the colony of Mindoir, she learns that not all of the galaxy enjoy her inclusive view of the aliens that the humans have recently encountered. One terrible event shapes her future and throws her into the galaxy alone.

Title: Blue Moons
Description: The surf, the sun, the sand, the naked blue girls... it must be Spring Break, Asari Republic style! Enjoy this unexpected little romp through a fun, laid back, positive/non-canon/make-believe happy ending post-war

Title: Body & Soul
Description: Several of Shepard's squadmates have their minds swapped, and find out what it's like to live in someone else's body

Title: Bondage effect
Description: Kira Shepard is an Amazon in every sense of the word.

Title: Bonded
Description: Aria and Tevos are bonded there for 50years, and I liked the challenge how that happened and how it could be a secret for such a long time. Thats why the story starts in 2129. It is the time of the political campaign for the new or old seats in the Citadel Council and Tevos is on her way to some colony...

Title: Bondmate Ball
Description: Liara T'Soni is from old aristocratic family... and sometimes they do things differently than common folk. Watch Shepard being confronted with one of those strange traditions.

Title: Broken
Description: Trauma fragments the ability to make meaning-fracturing memory, time and narrative. Yet it also clears space for new possibilities to emerge. When traumatic events shatter the lives of young Rachel Shepard and young Liara T'Soni, they struggle to pick up the pieces in time to achieve victory amidst all that is broken.

Title: Broken for the Better
Description: Samara is torn, the code, or the terrible bruning passion inside her...

Title: Brothers in Arms
Description: Miranda Lawson's 1st rule: Don't get close, friends are a weakness. Commander James Shepard fights first and foremost for his friends. When she see's his methods first hand her mind begins to change.

Title: Can Wait : Cronos Station Can Wait
Description: Liara comforts Shepard before the start of the final battle. An explicit extension of the cinematic before Cronos Station in ME3.

Title: Can Wait : Death Can Wait
Description: Liara and Shepard are reunited after the final battle and overcome their doubts.

Title: Can Wait : Tomorrow Can Wait
Description: Shepard and Liara sneak away during the Citadel DLC party and use it as an excuse to reconnect.

Title: Catalyst of Fate
Description: Commander Evangeline Shepard never asked to be brought back from the dead and she sure as hell didn't ask for the job of taking on the Reapers. The one thing she has asked for, she can't have.

Title: Catalyst of Fate : Architect of Fate
Description: Victory over the Reapers was achieved only at a steep galactic and personal cost – billions are dead and the galaxy hovers on the verge of anarchy. Scarred and changed by her actions, Evan Shepard risks losing everything she loves in the brutal struggle for peace.

Title: Caught
Description: What happens when Shepard walks in on Liara engaging in some self love?

Title: Challenge Accepted!
Description: The Normandy crew has destroyed Reapers and saved the galaxy more than once. However, their intrepid bravery is challenged by Shepard presenting a task that even the strongest may fail. What happens when an unstoppable, mischievous force meets an immovable object?

Title: Clearly a Mistake
Description: We all saw Jack and Miranda's confrontation - but just what were the circumstances surrounding and leading up to it?

Title: Cold Jack needs to warm up
Description: For the first time in her life Jack is somewhere on Earth where it gets cold outside during the winter. At first she just tries to power through it, but as it gets progressively colder she starts contemplating things like crawling in bed next to her LI and sharing body heat through gratuitous amounts of snuggling. Doesn't even have to be on Earth as long as Jack is driven to fluffy desperate measures to stay warm. Either Fine with M or FShep or Traynor as her LI, just no Miranda.

Title: Confidentiality

Title: Corrupted

Title: Cradle Snatcher

Title: Dark Energy
Description: Following a unique Renegade Shepard's story through all three games.Shepard is a real person, with real traumas...this is a side of her you have never seen.

Title: Dark Energy 2: Trail of Shadows
Description: The second installment of the Dark Energy trilogy. Follow the continuing tale of renegade Del Shepard through the events of the second game as she comes to grips with dying, living, and saving the galaxy, all over again.

Title: Dark Energy 3: End of Days
Description: Covering the events of ME3 w/alternate 'fix-it' ending, follow renegade Del Shepard as she struggles to unite a galaxy...and stop a threat greater than anyone has ever before known.

Title: Dark Energy 4: Aftermath

Title: Dark Energy 5: Inheritance
Description: It is 100 years from the time of Del Shepard's passing, and the truth of a very old enemy that once threatened the entirety of the galaxy is now coming to light. Who created the Reapers and why...and what happens when those creators realize that their creations have been defeated?

Title: Dark Energy AU: Best Left Said
Description: An AU based on my DE series. What if Del Shepard's past had been different? What if she were the one who was the shy scientist...and Liara was the hardened commando? How would it change them, and would the love that so defined them in DE blossom once again?

Title: Deepest Desires
Description: Liara's bane in the bedroom is that Shepard always has such perfect control, so she sets out to do something about it. What can she possibly do to finally push FemShep over the edge? Find a way to fulfill Shepard's deepest desire, that's what.

Title: Delusional Depredation
Description: Jack knows she messed up. She's already anticipating the inevitable argument from Miranda. But what if Miranda doesn't feel like it. What if she's tired of the B.S? DEPREDATION: Noun. An act of attacking or plundering.

Title: Dinner Party
Description: Liara and Shepard meet Aethyta and Hannah Shepard for dinner.

Title: Drunk Saturdays
Description:
Aria, Traynor, Miranda, and Aethyta find themselves in some sort of situation where they are alone. But with a lot of alcohol. Maybe some bar on Illium or Omega closed up and they find themselves loitering and talking for whatever reason. It doesn't really matter. Traynor starts out shy. Miranda, suspicious. Aria's indifferent at best. And Aethyta, well ... she's up for whatever. But ... as the night goes on, and they get more and more booze in them, they start to open up. They play stupid drinking games. They share secrets. So, what happens? One thing that is important is that they are all attracted to women (asari count) to some degree. Just looking for a fill full of hilarity that's all about ladies drinking and laughing and gawking at each other. Let their personalities and idiosyncrasies shine. Obligatory bonus points:
- Aethyta invents new drinks with questionable names.
- Aria reminisces about some obscure asari pop culture references from her childhood (and Aethyta gets it, even though she's younger).
- Traynor starts out giggling uncomfortably but then starts asking really personal, explicit questions as the night goes on.
- Miranda overshares about her sex life while drunk.

Title: Encaenia
Description: Encaenia ('consecration'): the annual ceremony at which the University of Oxford presents honorary degrees to distinguished alumnae and personages, and commemorates its benefactors. A year after the Reaper War, Sam and Shepard cross paths again.

Title: Erasing Lines
Description: Your average kinky, smutty, at some point probably unbearably fluffy Jackanda story. Wildly meandering points of view. I really tried to get in some halfway plausible character development, but my impatience always gets the better of me.

Title: Escape
Description: The Normandy escapes the Omega 4 Relay after destroying the collector base. Will Commander Shepard and ex-Cerberus Miranda Lawson find a way to stop the reapers in time? Can they handle the struggles they'll face as their relationship grows stronger? Does Miranda Lawson finally escape from her past and her father's influence?

Title: Everybody Wants A Slice
Description: Ever wonder what Communications Specialist Samantha Traynor did during all that downtime we didn't see her taking on the Citadel?

Title: Exordium

They are patient, constant, relentless. And they are far, far older than the infants now taking their first halting steps across the galactic sand." Events of ME:1. Title: Forgoing the Inevitable

Title: If : Ain't No Party Like a Citadel Party

The war is coming to a swift end, the signs are all around. After a failure on Thessia, the only thing left to do is hit Cerberus and then retake Earth.

A tour of the ship, quiet romantic dinner go without a hitch, but Normandy's artificial gravity generators malfunction. Shepard and Liara end up trapped in the captain's cabin in zero gravity. What is there to do?

Title: The Best Entertainment : Urgent Business
Description: When it comes to Aria's attention that she's been neglecting some of Tevos's needs, she hurries to rectify the situation - or tries to, at any rate. With a young daughter, meddling friends, and other nuisances to worry about, taking care of her bondmate is easier said than done.

Title: The Best Laid Plans

Judging by Asperger's and ME2, he's already a bit withdrawn, inattentive, eccentric, and antisocial (and that was before Overlord). And yet one curious asari takes a bigger interest in our second-favourite savant, and the feeling is mutual.

Title: The Justicar's Dog of War

So they enter into an unusual relationship that just barely fits into the Justicar Code, with Shepard submitting to Samara in every way. Shepard couldn't be happier; she gets to continue fighting for a just cause while being with with the one person she completely trusts, who also happens to be the sexiest thing in the universe as far as she's concerned. Samara however is wrestling with her feelings and her vows.

Unwilling to stand by and watch the Terminus fester with crime and corruption, one human started a campaign of justice in the name of a friend long dead. With each victory, his influence grew as did his fleet. Now, he has Omega in his sights...

The deeds of heroes are nothing without the remembrance of private moments, what shaped them. I would not have mine go untold. And I can think of none better to share them with...than you. - A retelling of ME1 through the eyes of Liara T'Soni. First and third person POV.
